TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit TokenCacheExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Extension methods used to subscribe to cache serialization events, and to effectively serialize and deserialize the cache
Docs.remarks: New in MSAL.NET 2.x: it's now possible to deserialize the token cache in two formats, the ADAL V3 legacy token cache format, and the new unified cache format, common to ADAL.NET, MSAL.NET, and other libraries on the same platform (MSAL.objc, on iOS)

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Deserialize (this Microsoft.Identity.Client.TokenCache tokenCache, byte[] unifiedState);
.method public static hidebysig void Deserialize(class Microsoft.Identity.Client.TokenCache tokenCache, unsigned int8[] unifiedState) cil managed
static member Deserialize : Microsoft.Identity.Client.TokenCache * byte[] -> unit

Docs.param: Token cache to deserialize (to fill-in from the state)
Array of bytes containing serialized Msal cache data
Docs.summary: Deserializes the token cache from a serialization blob in the unified cache format
Docs.remarks: Is a Json blob containing access tokens, refresh tokens, id tokens and accounts information.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DeserializeUnifiedAndAdalCache (this Microsoft.Identity.Client.TokenCache tokenCache, Microsoft.Identity.Core.Cache.CacheData cacheData);
.method public static hidebysig void DeserializeUnifiedAndAdalCache(class Microsoft.Identity.Client.TokenCache tokenCache, class Microsoft.Identity.Core.Cache.CacheData cacheData) cil managed
static member DeserializeUnifiedAndAdalCache : Microsoft.Identity.Client.TokenCache * Microsoft.Identity.Core.Cache.CacheData -> unit

Docs.param: Token cache to deserialize (to fill-in from the state)
Array of bytes containing serialicache data
Docs.summary: Deserializes the token cache from a serialization blob in both format (ADAL V3 format, and unified cache format)

MemberSignature.Value: public static byte[] Serialize (this Microsoft.Identity.Client.TokenCache tokenCache);
.method public static hidebysig unsigned int8[] Serialize(class Microsoft.Identity.Client.TokenCache tokenCache) cil managed
static member Serialize : Microsoft.Identity.Client.TokenCache -> byte[]

Docs.summary: Serializes the entire token cache, in the unified cache format only
Docs.returns: array of bytes containing the serialized unified cache

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Identity.Core.Cache.CacheData SerializeUnifiedAndAdalCache (this Microsoft.Identity.Client.TokenCache tokenCache);

static member SerializeUnifiedAndAdalCache : Microsoft.Identity.Client.TokenCache -> Microsoft.Identity.Core.Cache.CacheData

Docs.summary: Serializes the entire token cache in both the ADAL V3 and unified cache formats.

Docs.param: Delegate set in order to handle the cache serialization in the case where the member of the cache is true
Docs.summary: Sets a delegate to be notified after any library method accesses the cache. This gives an option to the delegate to serialize a cache entry for the application and accounts specified in the . See https://aka.ms/msal-net-token-cache-serialization
Docs.remarks: In the case where the delegate is used to serialize the cache entierely (not just a row), it might want to call

Docs.param: Token cache that will be accessed
Delegate set in order to prepare the cache serialization
Docs.summary: Sets a delegate called before any library method writes to the cache. This gives an option to the delegate to reload the cache state from a row in database and lock that row. That database row can then be unlocked in the delegate registered with
